snippet: The widow and children of a Transportation Security Administration agent who was killed by a gunman at Los Angeles International Airport last fall are suing the city and county for $25 million....

headline.print_headline: Family of Slain TSA Agent Sues LA, Airport, County
headline.main: Family of Slain TSA Agent Sues LA, Airport, County

lead_paragraph: The widow and children of a Transportation Security Administration agent who was killed by a gunman at Los Angeles International Airport last fall are suing the city and county for $25 million.
